entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: v2025.07.30-1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Show the progress of generating the application list in the GUI by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2093

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/compare/v2025.07.29-3...v2025.07.30-1

entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: v2025.07.31-1

entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: v2025.08.02-1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Clean up menu_app_select slightly by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2097
  • Add ds -S and ds --select commands to go directly to the app sele… by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2098
  • Add templates to all temporary file names, showing app name, function… by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2099
  • Remove temp file when done using it in env_update by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2100
  • Rename the log temp file to DockSTARTer.log.XXXXXXXXXX by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2101
  • Change dialog --stdout to dialog --output-fd 1, and add `--no-tri… by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2102
  • Update the progress bar in menu_app_select, with progress and logging in separate windows on the screen by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2103

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/compare/v2025.07.31-1...v2025.08.02-1

entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: v2025.08.02-2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Re-enabled the tput reset that I had temporarily disabled while deb… by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2104
  • Update the dialog options in menu_app_select to preserve all whit… by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2105

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/compare/v2025.08.02-1...v2025.08.02-2

entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: v2025.08.06-1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update app select, adding theming to the progress screen by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2106
  • Add missing Progress colors to Debian theme by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2107
  • Add missing end line by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2108
  • Move --select option below the env_create call by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2109
  • Sanitize application variable values as they are added by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2110
  • Add missing linefeed in notices for appvars_purge by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2111
  • Update the progress bar in menu_app_select by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2112

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/compare/v2025.08.02-2...v2025.08.06-1
